name: Laser Defender (nixelone)
description:
This is a 2D shooter set in space. You try to compete for the highest score while trying to survive the hordes of enemy spaceships. Enemies become stronger after a while.

Controlls:

w,a,s,d - movement, spacebar - shoot, when not shooting you automatically heal

WARNING!: Sometimes the game's resolution glitches. Just enter and exit the fullscreen mode to solve the issue.
